description:
Powerful wizard; former assistant of http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur].
Has sold his soul (and part of this body) to the king of Nemesis in order to gain power. He is at least 50 years old but his body ages backwards, i. e. grows younger over time.
Ganossa was responsible for the failure of the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]", thus causing the "Silent Crisis".
name: Ganossa Maximilian
